;onewayroad orthogonalxdiagonal intersection, diagonal lightrail ~ in order to build elevatedrail overhead whole junction, onewayroad junctions need to be kept seperate. i.e. not dragged through orthogonally.
;1a
TYPE1=0x03010000,0x02030100,0x5F872200,0,0
TYPE2=0x01000003,0x03010002,0x5F872200,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000301,0x01000203,0x5F872200,2,0
TYPE4=0x00030100,0x00020301,0x5F872200,3,0
TYPE5=0x03010000,0x01020003,0x5F872200,1,1
TYPE6=0x00030100,0x03010200,0x5F872200,2,1
TYPE7=0x00000301,0x00030102,0x5F872200,3,1
TYPE8=0x01000003,0x02000301,0x5F872200,0,1
;1b
TYPE1=0x00000301,0x02030100,0x5F872300,0,0
TYPE2=0x00030100,0x03010002,0x5F872300,1,0
TYPE3=0x03010000,0x01000203,0x5F872300,2,0
TYPE4=0x01000003,0x00020301,0x5F872300,3,0
TYPE5=0x00030100,0x02000301,0x5F872300,0,1
TYPE6=0x01000003,0x03010200,0x5F872300,2,1
TYPE7=0x00000301,0x01020003,0x5F872300,1,1
TYPE8=0x03010000,0x00030102,0x5F872300,3,1
;1c orthogonal extra ~ to allow orthogonal drawing right through the junction once elevated rail has been built overhead
TYPE1a=0x03010000,0x02000203,0x5F872300,2,0
TYPE1b=0x00000301,0x02030200,0x5F872300,0,0
TYPE2a=0x01000003,0x00020302,0x5F872300,3,0
TYPE2b=0x00030100,0x03020002,0x5F872300,1,0

TYPE4a=0x00030100,0x02000201,0x5F872300,0,1
TYPE4b=0x01000003,0x02010200,0x5F872300,2,1
